articles.title: Kim Yong Nam receives credentials from Lebanese ambassador
FM meets new Lebanese ambassador
articles.content:
FM meets new Lebanese ambassador 
     Pyongyang, July 7 (KCNA) -- Paek Nam Sun, Foreign Minister of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, had a talk with Zeidan al Saghir, newly appointed Ambassador E. P. of the Republic of Lebanon to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him today.
